name: Steam Clock
short description: A famous steam-powered clock and iconic symbol of the historic Gastown district.

short description: A major art museum featuring a vast collection of Canadian and international art.

short description: A sprawling urban park offering scenic views, trails, and beaches.

short description: An architectural landmark resembling the Roman Colosseum, housing an extensive collection.
